summary: This document is an email exchange between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein discussing a potential meeting in Beijing. The correspondence indicates a scheduled time and location for the meeting, highlighting the professional relationship between the two individuals.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and checking his schedule with the Asia team.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is initiating a meeting with Jes Staley and discussing his schedule.

connections.description: Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein are coordinating a meeting, indicating a professional relationship.

events.title: Proposed Meeting in Beijing
events.description: Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein proposed a meeting at The St Regis Hotel in Beijing.

locations: The St Regis Hotel, 21 Jianguomenwai Dajie, Beijing 100020
keyFacts: The email exchange took place on August 20, 2010.
Jes Staley suggested a meeting time of 5:30 PM in Beijing.
Jeffrey Epstein mentioned having someone come to New York on the following Monday.
The proposed meeting was scheduled for September 2, 2010.
The email contains confidentiality disclaimers and is marked as attorney-client privileged.
